<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Peri](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1262)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Peris are contrary, artful celestials renowned for their beauty as much as their deceptive natures. Mercurial, though never malicious, peris strive to aid mortals, though they are more likely to dispense riddles and quests than to offer aid outright.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Celestial](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 32

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Peri.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 14">[Peri](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1262)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Celestial" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=23" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 201</row>

**Perception** +26; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), smoke vision

**Languages**
[Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Ignan](/Languages.aspx?ID=18), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +27, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +25, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +23, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +28, [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +25, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +28, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +24

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +7

**Con** +4

**Int** +5

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +8
</row>

**Smoke Vision** A peri can see through smoke with ease, and they ignore the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) condition from smoke.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 36 

**Fort** +22 

**Ref** +27 

**Will** +26 

</row>

**HP** 255

**Immunities**
fire

**Resistances**
cold 5

**Weaknesses**
[cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) 10, evil 10

**Shining Blaze** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) 5 feet, 6d6 fire damage (DC 31 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 0 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
scimitar +29 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Good](/Traits.aspx?ID=83), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 3d6+13 slashing plus 2d6 fire

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
burning wings +29 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Good](/Traits.aspx?ID=83), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d10+13 fire

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
flame ray +29 ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Good](/Traits.aspx?ID=83), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 8d6 fire

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 34, attack +26
- **Cantrips (7th)**
[Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236)
- **7th**
[Humanoid Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=153) (at will), [Wall of Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=362) (×3)
- **Constant (4th)**
[Fire Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=118)

**Flame Jump** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156)) **Frequency** once per hour; **Effect** The peri Strides into an open flame of their size or larger and instantly transports themself to any other flame of sufficient size within 100 miles. Once they enter the first flame, the peri instantly learns the locations of all other flames within range.

**Flameheart Weapon**   The peri can call forth a powerful weapon from their heart of flame. In their hands, this is a _+2 [greater flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) weapon_ that deals 2d6 fire damage instead of 1d6.

**Flamewing Buffet** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The peri makes one scimitar Strike and two burning wings Strikes, in any order.

**Wildfire Storm** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) The peri spreads their wings and spins, forming a whirlwind of flame that deals 15d6 fire damage in a 20-foot emanation (DC 34 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). They can't use Wildfire Storm again for 1d4 rounds.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png">The Lambent Court</title>

Though they eschew servitude and the worship of gods, many peris consider themselves friends and allies of [Atreia](/Deities.aspx?ID=101), the Lambent King, the imprisoned elemental lord of fire. They guard and conceal his holy sites from his enemies and send mortals out in search of his prison, the _Garnet Brand_, hoping to bring the benevolent force of exalted light and fire back into the multiverse.
</aside>
